Merry Christmas!! :-D

Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's photo. LiGHT (Living in Greater Horizons Together) aims its activities around achieving 8 broad objectives which are in turn a part of the UN SDG Action Campaign and Coalition of Leaders for Sustainable Development. #LiGHT #L8 #objectives #vision #un #sdg

message: Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's photo. "Awareness leads to responsibility." Hence, in order to solve a problem, we first need to be conscious of it. Under our objective of Social Awareness, we wish to utilize all available platforms and explore innovative methods to highlight the social issues. This would pacify our action plan of developing accessible solutions. #LIGHT #L8 #Objectives #SocialAwareness #CHANGE

message: Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's photo. Women are the mirrors of society! Guaranteeing the rights of women and giving them opportunities to reach their full potential is critical not only for attaining gender equality, but also for meeting a wide range of international development goals. Hence our third objective is women empowerment. #objective #womenempowerment

message:
Children are the future, nurture them right, so that they grow up to be able leaders, and lead the world toward Light!
Happy Children's Day!

Children are the future, nurture them right, so that they grow up to be able leaders, and lead the world toward Light!
Happy Children's Day!

Gopali Youth Welfare Society shared LIGHT's post. LIGHT takes pleasure to announce the list of colleges where our centers are about to be opened by New Year 2018. The institutes are as follows: 1. NIT Warangal 2. National Institute of Technology Calicut 3. Sagar Group of Institutions (SISTec), Bhopal We are very glad to welcome these prestigious institutions into the LIGHT family! There are a lot of other IITs, NITs and IIITs in the final step of agreement and we look forward to help any college that has an intention to be a part of this noble mission.

message:
On the occasion of Sports Day, the team of Gopali Youth Welfare Society along with teachers of Jagriti Vidya Mandir conducted different sports events in school in order to promote the importance of sports in Education and Fitness. The events definitely helped in the overall development of the students in an enthusiastic and entertaining manner. 
#gyws #jvm #education #sports #fitness

message:
We spread light in the world to drive away the darkness.
GYWS wishes everyone a Happy and Safe Diwali!

#Diwali

We spread light in the world to drive away the darkness.
GYWS wishes everyone a Happy and Safe Diwali!

#Diwali
Creativity in education is as important as literacy because this creativity of today can bring great innovation in tomorrow's world!
Creativity in education is as important as literacy because this creativity of today can bring great innovation in tomorrow's world!
Let us follow the path of truth and wisdom and pay homage to our Father of Nation this day!
